review: I was at Clumax Indiranagar for HSG test. The scan was performed by Dr.Padmini. She is very caring and explained the process very patiently. The scan was done with due care Although I felt a minor discomfort , Doctor was gentle at handling my case.Thankyou Doctor!!!

Hi ,am Aruna yesterday i had been to clumax for HSG & i had few enquries before proceeding the procedure however Dr. Padmini was calmly taking our request & suggested another test before HSG & later proceeded with HSG.I highly recommend Dr.Padmini for her positive talk to any couple.

Firstly, doctor does not come to hospital on time. There is a huge waiting time. Secondly, I had visited the doctor because of severe stomach and lower back pain owing to endometriosis. Also, to stop bleeding which was continuing post menstrual cycle. * **** **** ** *********** ********* *** even a vaccination was prescribed *** *** **** ****** *** ***** * ******* *** ****** *** *** ***********Wasted around 10k doing all the tests, getting all the medicines but it did not help me a bit in reducing the bleeding or the pain.

The fees mentioned in Practo was 500, I was charged Rs 600.00
The doc was late by 50 min, I wasn’t informed abt the delay in advance. Scanning was recommended but the clinic didn’t have the technician ..I was not at all happy with the experience
reply_text: Sorry for your message , since covid iam not available for immediate assistance, clinic inform me about your consultation when you have arrived, immediately I get prepared and arrived.

review: *** * *** ******* *** *** ******** **** **** ******* * ****** ******** ******* ********My sister went to cluemax for her HSG test and she was not guided through for the process it was her first time. My sister is undergoing alot of pain and there is an internal injury which is affected her badly. It is such an horrible experience ever. The doctor **** *** **** *** ** **** ** * ******** *** used "HARSH WORDS"to my sister, when the patient asked for time to get ready for the test the doctor refused and performed the procedure ** * ***** ******* She was not ready to listen to the patient when the patient was in severe pain. *** ******** ******* ******* ** ****** ** ********** **** ** **** *** ****** ***** ***** * ***** * ******* *** ** *** ** ***** *** ********* **** **** **** ** *******

Everyone knows HSG is a very painful procedure. I got my HSG done by this doctor at clumax. She explained me the procedure well and since I was very scared  she supported me throughout the producer. I highly recommend this doctor.
